content: stuff and shape my doll if there s anything you re unhappy about with regards to your dolls invisible decreases colour changes stuffing shaping sewing the arms on making the hair caps etc you ll either find them in this set of video s or on the youtube channel 6 part video tutorial playlist can be found here even i was surprised to actually watch just how much stuffing i used weebee dolls are hungry the weebee and friend s youtube channel can be found here ~ ~ is the clothing removable how does it go on over the dolls head all of the items in my doll clothing patterns are removable the clothing items are designed to go on over their feet ~ ~ special stitches invisible single_crochet decrease please read - as this way of decreasing should be used throughout the pattern decrease insert hook in front loop only of first st insert hook in front loop only of second st 3 lps on hook yo and draw through 2 lps yo and complete single_crochet as normal please see this youtube video for a demonstration of this type of decrease useful from 1min 48 in 3hdc bobble 1 yo insert hook into st and draw up a loop 3 loops on hook 2 yo insert hook into st and draw up a loop 5 loops on hook 3 yo insert hook into st and draw up a loop 7 loops on hook 4 yo and pull through all 7 loops on hook ~ ~ pattern start hands and arms make 2 crocheted in continuous spirals without joining the rounds from hand to shoulder use a stitch marker to keep track of where the beginning of each round starts ~ 3 ~ rnds 1 5 using skin tone yarn follow as per the medium sized weebee doll pattern find the link to the pattern on the first page if you do not have a copy to hand change colour for the body green in example to achieve the neat colour change as pictured work a round of loose slip stitches into the back loops only of round 5 this round of slip stitches never classes as a round then work round 6 into the back loops only of those slip stitches work the decrease in this round as per the invisible decrease at the start of the pattern but work into the two back loops rather than the front you can see me demonstrating this kind of colour change in this video on the weebee and friend s youtube channel here rnds 6 10 continue to work as per the arms in the medium weebee doll pattern stuff hand firmly and the arm lighter and lighter towards the top there should be very little stuffing in the top of the arm be careful not to overstuff the arm it should be tapered from the side and sit nicely at the side of the body when attached see photo on
